ygData.subject: Re: My wishlist on the interface
ygData.msgSnippet: ok if you are in unrest i will assume you are grouped and someone is pulling or tanking.  yes mobs are very hard to target, so never use the mouse to target.
ygData.messageBody:
ok if you are in unrest i will assume you are grouped and someone is pulling
or tanking. yes mobs are very hard to target, so never use the mouse to
target. whoever the entire group is supposed to assist so you all have the
same target (be it your puller or tank), hit the function key that
corresponds to his/her player in your group (f2 to f6) then type /as and hit
enter. it works every time for me.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> 5. Why oh WHY are some critters so hard to target? I'll be in
> unrest - 2
> darkbones banging on my crew - a deeth beetle at my feet - and the dam
> deeth beetle is the only thing I can manage to target? I try
> to use assist,
> but it seems very, very buggy - more than half the time - it
> just doesn't
> work. Is there some reason that F8 couldn't CYCLE thru the
> nearest mob's,
> instead of only the one IT thinks is closest?
>
